backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling user profiles and CRUD operations for goals with access control enforcement and per-user goal storage.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of multiple frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with light and dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication flow, and layout including profile setup handling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppBottomNav: Mobile bottom navigation with home and other route links, including active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/app/AppNav.tsx: Desktop navigation bar showing main app routes with active styling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: App layout wrapper with header, footer, authenticated navigation, and content container.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Authentication control component for signing in or out using Internet Identity with status handling.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalCard.t: Displays a goal card with navigation, checkbox toggle, and swipe-to-complete interactions using React state and mutations.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalForm.t: Renders a form to create or edit goals with validation, controlled inputs, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a modal prompting the user to enter and save their name via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/state/EmptyGoals: Displays an empty-state view encouraging users to create their first goal.
frontend/src/components/state/LoadingSta: Provides skeleton loading components for lists and goal detail views.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and goals through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with custom color palettes and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/goals/types.ts: Provides helpers for goal status labels and colors and exports the list of all statuses.
frontend/src/lib/goals/validation.ts: Includes simple validation functions for goal titles and progress values.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Utility functions for converting between bigint timestamps and Date objects and formatting them.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AveragesPage.tsx: Fetches goals and displays average progress and completion statistics with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CreateGoalPage.tsx: Renders a form to create a new goal and handles submission via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/GoalDetailPage.tsx: Shows goal details with edit and delete functionality, including loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboardPage.ts: Displays a filterable grid of goals with loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LanguagesPage.tsx: Placeholder page describing upcoming language selection features.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Placeholder page outlining future notification preference settings.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the user's profile info with loading and error states, including principal ID and name.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides a settings page allowing users to view and update their display name with validation, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Displays goal statistics with counts and progress, handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, and components with plugin support.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing features, new requests, and project configuration state.
